data.actual_result: There are two things that can happen at random. Either the clearance won't work and you'll get your most recent search terms after relaunching the app, or the search history will remain empty even if you don't clear it by tapping on the button
data.expected_result: The saved search results should appear and the clearance button should work
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap on the search function from anywhere - Type a few things down, randomly - Tap on the clear button and exit the app - Launch the app again and look at the search history
